Items.Title: Zepeto Module Importer
Items.Description_ko: 다양한 모듈을 쉽게 임폴트 할 수 있습니다.

Items.Title: Multiplay Component
Items.Description: Component for synchronizing data between devices.
Items.Description_ko: Multiplay Component 입니다. 꼭 가이드를 먼저 봐주세요.

Items.Title: Interaction
Items.Description: System for handling user interactions with the application.

Items.Title: Gesture
Items.Description: API for recognizing and processing user gestures.

Items.Title: ScreenShot
Items.Description: Utility for capturing and saving screenshots of the application.

Items.Title: LeaderBoard
Items.Description: sample for managing and displaying leaderboard data.

Items.Title: Product
Items.Description: sample for Product, you need server code
Items.Description_ko: Product sample 입니다. 꼭 가이드를 봐주세요.

Items.Title: Localization
Items.Description: Feature for multilingual support. Local keys and translations are managed using Google Spreadsheet and can be exported to csv and reflected in the project.
Items.Description_ko: 다국어 지원을 위한 기능입니다. 로컬키와 번역문은 구글스프레드시트를 이용하여 관리하며,  csv로 export하여 프로젝트에 반영할 수 있습니다.
